channel.title: [PI] Few Questions
channel.description:
Some of these might be client sided, but I'm just going to put them all on one post so I don't have to create 2 posts.
1) Godswords- When someone wields them on one side there shows a black triangle coming out of the chars right arm. How can I fix this?
2) Partyhats- They I think are too low because the hair goes through parts of them and looks stupid.
3) Vesta long and korasi, the are held up like a spear, how can I change it to straight out like in normal servers?

item.title: [PI] Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Nothing is stupid if your answering my question Thanks I’ll give it a try.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @UndeadDino UndeadDino
item.description:
@UndeadDino wrote:

I know this sounds stupid, but look up how to add custom weapons, and items. It should tell you how to fix the item if it is glitchy.

Read full topic
